name: muji-hotel
//: SECURITY NOTE: 13 low-severity vulnerabilities exist in min-document (Sanity transitive dependency).
//2: Vulnerability: Prototype pollution in min-document <=2.19.0 (all versions affected).
//3: Status: Using latest Sanity v4.10.2 and next-sanity v11.4.2. Awaiting upstream fix.
//4: Risk: LOW - min-document is not directly exposed in production; used internally by Sanity Studio.

scripts.audit:summary: npm audit --json | node -e "const data = JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0, 'utf-8')); console.log(`Total: ${data.metadata.vulnerabilities.total} | Info: ${data.metadata.vulnerabilities.info} | Low: ${data.metadata.vulnerabilities.low} | Moderate: ${data.metadata.vulnerabilities.moderate} | High: ${data.metadata.vulnerabilities.high} | Critical: ${data.metadata.vulnerabilities.critical}`);"
